dcterms:creator: O. Banos
R. Garcia

H. Pomares
I. Rojas

C. Villalonga
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of the on-body sensor records from 10 participants doing 13 daily living and exercise activities. It includes three modalities: accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer.
dcterms:title: mHealth

dcterms:creator: B. Kwolek
M. Kepski
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 70 video clips of human activities with 3 classes. It includes three modalities: RGB camera, depth camera, and sensory data from accelerometers.
dcterms:title: UR Fall Detection

dcterms:creator: R. Chavarriaga
H. Sagha
A. Calatroni
S. T. Digumarti
G. Tröster
J. d. R. Millán
D. Roggen
dcterms:description: This is the human activity recognition dataset that consists of the on-body sensor records from 4 participants doing kitchen activities. It includes two modalities: accelerometers and gyroscopes.
dcterms:title: Opportunity
